attributes.additional_details:
Everytime a company outsources more people lose their jobs. The Government or Parliament need to stop this practice
British Airways has been doing this for years and intends to continue to do this. This country will end up in poverty as more and more call centres/IT departments etc close. As a country we lose revenue as those abroad will pay taxes to their governments. It has to stop now

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you'd like to stop companies moving jobs overseas, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to achieve this. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
